item.title: Class IX student pregnant after ‘love trap’; youth held
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: A shocking case has emerged from Maski police station limits in Raichur district, where a 9th-grade student fell prey to a so-called ‘love trap’ and became pregnant. The accused, identified as Shivamurthy (25), has been arrested and booked under the Protection of Children from Sexual Offenses (POCSO) Act.
According to police sources, the girl’s father runs a chicken shop in Maski town. The accused reportedly visited the shop to buy meat and paid through PhonePe. Later, using the number...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
